put.mlc.classifiers.pcc.inference.montecarlo

Class MonteCarloInference

  • java.lang.Object
    • put.mlc.classifiers.pcc.inference.Inference
      • put.mlc.classifiers.pcc.inference.montecarlo.MonteCarloInference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IInference
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FMeasureMaximizerInference, JointModeInference, MarginalModesInference, QuadraticNaiveFMaximizerInference, RankLossMaximizerInference

    public abstract class MonteCarloInference
extends Inference
    Implementation of the Monte Carlo Inference algorithm in Probabilistic Classifier Chains.
    The algorithm samples arrays of label combinations with the Monte Carlo. The Monte Carlo method is used for estimation of probability distribution.
    Author:
    Krzysztof Dembczynski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
